posts.postText:
I am looking for some people that would say they are good in tf2, preferably a good soldier/heavy. But medic/demoman are always good to have too.

If you think you fit them, post here . I need to gather a quick pick up team.
You wont find any pro tf2 players here, but I am good as a solly, always played arena, fit for survival over kills. This being said, my time schedule sucks XD
Your looking at a Solid Medic/pyro here.
I'm not too good at TF2 but I'm not terrible, if you need me, I can fill any slot besides demoman, soldier, or spy.

Im not terrible either.

I play sniper and soldier (occasionally pyro and scout).

>> I play just about anything. 
I thought you specialized as a medic.

>> >> I play just about anything. 
I thought you specialized as a medic. 
Doesn't mean I don't tear shit up as a demo or spy.

>> You wont find any pro tf2 players here 
I just started playing regularly again after a long break from the normal tf2 gamemodes, and i wouldn't say i'm "OMFG HOW DID HE 500 KILLS IN 30 SECONDS" insanely good/active at the game, but I don't think that your claim was 100% true :P
i also have a tourney team assembled

I can play most things (not medic, and not the best sniper), but I am a good soldier, demo, and scout.  Probably spy too, but haven't played much spy lately. Oh, and my pyro is really good when I'm on my game, but he isn't really a "pro" class.
I can do Demo/medic/solidier/heavy but i'm best with the demo

>> I'll do anything 

We already know that Balenti, we're asking about TF2 here.
I meant as in classes, but you already knew that didn't you?

DAT WAS NOT MEDICINE

which roughly translated from german means: I think i am a decent medic and could medicate.
When fudge gets back on we would play. We aren't terrible. :0

Lets see, Quack, Kryzoid, Me, I may have to friends joining from out of NNJG, If i need others i will let you know.

EDIT: Got a server, talking to owner about map rotation. Will be good practice for us.
